table.name: vtiger_bhscampaignreport
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhscampaignreport` ( `bhscampaignreportid` int(19) NOT NULL, `bhscampaignreport_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhscampaignreportid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhscampaignreportcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhscampaignreportcf` ( `bhscampaignreportid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhscampaignreportid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
